thread.title: Twitter Destroys Health Blogger Who Dared To Insult Pizza
thread.title_full: Twitter Destroys Health Blogger Who Dared To Insult Pizza

author: Elyse Wanshel
title: Twitter Destroys Health Blogger Who Dared To Insult Pizza
text:
Twitter Destroys Health Blogger Who Dared To Insult Pizza Bad move. LauriPatterson via Getty Images YAS. 
If you love pizza , very few things in life are comparable to the pure, cheese-filled joy that occurs when you bite into a slice. 
But Naija Gym Blog , a health blogger, tried to rob the world of pizza‚Äôs unadulterated awesomeness by exposing its caloric underbelly in a total Debbie Downer of a tweet: Two slices of pizza are the equivalent to swallowing 3 spoons of warm oil. Do you feel like eating pizza now? pic.twitter.com/MXBl9lFIYv ‚Äî Naija Gym Blog (@naijagym) February 16, 2017 
We won‚Äôt even get into how Naija Gym Blog used the greasiest, unappealing $1 slices in all of New York City for this post, or how there are healthy pizza options out there or that the poster felt so righteous in their food judgy-ness that they also tweeted a freakin‚Äô poll: LOVE FOR PIZZA POLLüòÉ: Two slices of pizza are the equivalent to swallowing 3 spoons of warm oil. Do you feel like eating pizza now? Pls RT ‚Äî Naija Gym Blog (@naijagym) February 20, 2017 
Thankfully, the fine ‚ÄúIDGAF‚Äù people of Twitter were not having any of this blogger‚Äôs foolishness. Instead, they clapped back with a pizza their minds. 
Here are the sauciest responses: I don't think this is quite going the way @naijagym intended pic.twitter.com/3aIAAxAlet ‚Äî your good pal vk (@VilinskiKonjic) February 19, 2017 @naijagym @VilinskiKonjic hahaha "have you ever had pizza?" ‚Äî Elliott Clarke (@EJ_Clarke) February 19, 2017 @naijagym yess,just look at it calling my name üòç ‚Äî Nigerian Spice¬∞ (@Miss_3ff) February 17, 2017 @naijagym Pizza? Who has pizza? I want pizza ‚Äî LDN Ghost/Flower (@charlotte_moth) February 19, 2017 @naijagym that's not a pizza, this is pic.twitter.com/rai9QyXatN ‚Äî Trash Begins (@koalalampour) February 19, 2017 @naijagym doesn't matter how many times you tweet and retweet this. The answer will always be "YES" üòçüòçüòÜ
